definition: to hold in one's arms/to embrace
to hug/to embrace/to hold in one's arms
to draw towards oneself/to gather/to gather up (one's gown, sleeves etc)/to grab (money)/to extort
to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)

sentences.english: Guillermo put his arm around her shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 吉尔勒莫伸开胳膊搂住她的肩膀。

sentences.english: She locked her arms about his neck.
sentences.chinese: 她用手臂紧紧搂住他的脖子。

sentences.english: He circled her waist with his arm.
People cant dead, senior around Sun Qian body plunged into grief.
sentences.chinese: 人死不能复生，老资格搂住孙谦的遗体陷入到悲痛中。

sentences.english: She grasped his waist, and so they reached the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 她把他的腰搂住了，两人就这样跑到了山下。

sentences.english: Mark joined her, holding her in his arms.
sentences.chinese: 马克靠近桑德拉，用双臂紧紧的搂住她。

sentences.english: He put his hands around her slender waist.
sentences.chinese: 他双手搂住她纤细的腰。

sentences.english: I smiled and threw my arms around his neck.
sentences.chinese: 我笑着用双手搂住他的脖子。

sentences.english: She held him closer round the neck, and rocked him on her breastlike a child.
sentences.chinese: 她更紧地搂住他的脖子，像摇孩子似的在胸前摇着他。

sentences.english: He draped his arms round her neck.
sentences.chinese: 他双手搂住了她的脖子。

sentences.english: Joy held her baby tight, muttering a silent prayer of thanks.
sentences.chinese: 乔伊紧紧地搂住自己的孩子，心中默诵地祈祷感谢。

sentences.english: He put his heavy arms around me and rubbed his big hands on my back.
sentences.chinese: 他用他的粗胳膊把我搂住，大手在我背后摩挲。

sentences.english: He had twined his chubby arms around Vincent's neck.
sentences.chinese: 他胖乎乎的双臂搂住文森特的脖子。

sentences.english: Jack enclasped her waist in his arm.
sentences.chinese: 杰克用胳膊搂住她的腰。

sentences.english: Her arms closed around her long lost relative.
sentences.chinese: 她用双臂搂住了她失散多年的亲属。

definition: to hug/to embrace/to hold in one's arms
to draw towards oneself/to gather/to gather up (one's gown, sleeves etc)/to grab (money)/to extort
to reach out with one's hand/to hold out a hand/(fig.) to beg/to get involved/to meddle
